title: Person - from schema.org
description: An person object from schema.org (see https://schema.org/Person).

additionalName.description: An additional name for a Person, can be used for a middle name.

address.description: PostalAddress  or TextPhysical address of the item.

affiliation.description: An organization that this person is affiliated with. For example, a school/university, a club, or a team.

birthDate.description: An organization that this person is affiliated with. For example, a school/university, a club, or a team.

birthPlace.description: The place where the person was born.

contactPoint.description: A contact point for a person or organization. Supersedes contactPoints.

familyName.description: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of a Person.

givenName.description: FGiven name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person.
